periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 4am. Cloudy. Low around 58, with temperatures rising to around 65 overnight. South wind 16 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 7am and 8am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 3pm and 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Some of the storms could be severe. Cloudy. High near 80, with temperatures falling to around 75 in the afternoon. South wind 21 to 28 mph, with gusts as high as 48 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 2am. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy. Low around 57, with temperatures rising to around 59 overnight. Southwest wind 5 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 4pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 66. North wind 2 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 53. Northeast wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 71. East wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a low around 60. South southeast wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a high near 67. South southeast wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a low around 46. North wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 54. North northwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 37. Northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 57. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 33. North northwest wind 3 to 8 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 57. North northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.
